pwjdgus1017obfuscate@donga.ac.kr

I joined the Department of Computer Engineering at Dong-A University in March 2018. Since September 2021, I have been actively involved in the Data Science Research Lab, focusing on research related to site selection methodologies using data mining and graph networks.

Research interests

Carbon-Aware Task MigrationCarbon-Aware Computing

Projects

Carbon-friendly - About The process involves measuring the carbon emissions generated from deep learning training. If a server's training process produces high carbon emissions, we transfer the workload to servers with lower carbon emissions. Ultimately, this method aims to achieve a carbon net-zero state.

Green-Car-Charging-Station-Site-Selection - A Study on the Location Analysis of Green Car Charging Station Using Bayesian Network

COCL - A undergraduate project on managing carbon emissions on campus.

FDIA_with_TCN -

Balance_Up - Employment information recommendation based on Life Balance

Data_Analytics_for_Age_friendly_busan - Age Friendly World Project
